data.name: Eternity: The Last Unicorn - Digital Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Eternity: The Last Unicorn Official Digital Soundtrack



Immerse yourself into the world of Eternity with 15 tracks that capure both the Nordic and fantastical themes of the game!

Author: Thiago Adamo AKA PXLDJ.

Available formats: WAV, MP3.

Track List:
  • 01 - Finding The Eternity Main Theme
  • 02 - The Temple
  • 03 - Spirit Forest
  • 04 - Enemies In The Forest
  • 05 - The Lord Of The Forest
  • 06 - Into The Dark Caves
  • 07 - Catacombs
  • 08 - Dark Places
  • 09 - Rise Of The Warrior
  • 10 - Rain And The Bonfire
  • 11 - Last Scenario Song
  • 12 - Last Stand Final Master
  • 13 - Facing The End
  • 14 - Cutscenes
  • 15 - Credits Song

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Windows
  • Processor: Intel Atom
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics
  • Sound Card: Any sound card.
  • Additional Notes: WAV and MP3 music only
